value:
I wish I knew why I don't have the
royal Brand like my brother and
sister...

I'm a Shepherd, just like my brother.
We travel everywhere and help
people all over the world!

You feeling OK? If you get hurt,
just let me know. I'll have you
patched up in a jiffy!

Sharena seems nice. I wonder if
we could have a "princess chat"
sometime...

Heehee! I'll put the frog here and...
AH, $Nu?!$k$pAwww, you caught me before I pulled
the BEST prank!

Hey, $Nu!$k$pGuess who sent me to say hello?
It was $Nf!
I think I'm ready for the front lines!

I've still got a few tricks up my
sleeve!
Maybe I didn't work hard enough?
I've come far since meeting you.

I'm Lissa, and despite what my brother
says, I am not delicate! I'm a princess
and a member of the Shepherds!

Hey! I was thinking that I've grown
up a lot since I got here. Don'tcha
think, $Nu?$k$pI've learned to fight, I've made
friends with people in the Order,
and I always clean my plate!$k$p...Thanks! Glad you agree! Of
course, it's all because of your help
that I'm so princessy now!$k$pI feel like I'm one step closer to
being the ideal lady. I hope you'll
keep helping me get there!$k$pOh, and I've gotten better at little
pranks, too. I can't wait for you to
find the frog I just hid!
えいっ！
それっ！
きゃあっ
Ooops...
I may surprise you!
This one might hurt!
How's THIS for delicate?!
I'm going all out!
Sorry...
Eheehee
Let's do our best!
Always glad to help.
I've been called "delicate" but only by big, jerky brothers.
Hey, hey! Tell me all about yourself.
I love this team you've built! What other tricks have you got up your sleeve?
Someday I'll work on being a proper lady like my sister...
Let's not waste this opportunity to become good friends!
OK.
What's up?
Yup.
